roleset.name: move downward
roleset.note: FALL-V NOTES: Member of Vncls escape-51.1-2, calibratable_cos-45.6-1. (from fall.01-v)

role.descr: end point, end state of arg1

example.name: all args
example.text: Profits fell 10% to $118 million from $130.6 million

example.name: arg2 as manner
example.text: British government bonds fell sharply initially.

example.name: temporal, with EXT
example.text: The average junk bond fell by 4.2% in October

example.name: non financial, fall into
example.text: They fell into oblivion after the 1929 crash.

example.name: Args 1, 2, 3
example.text: The Dow's falling 52 points to 12628 was an indication that the nation was moving closer to the possibility of a credit downgrade.

example.name: autogen1
example.text: the stock market lurched into a 190-point free fall on Oct. 13

example.name: autogen2
example.text: the estimated 2 % fall in imports

example.name: motion arg1
example.text: These tree branches cushioned her fall

example.name: non-numeric arg2
example.text: The dramatic rise and fall of US software stocks

example.name: Watch out for .LVs!!!
example.text: In the '70s , the market took falls nine times in a row on Friday the you - know - what .
example.arg: argM-PRX: falls (tag the NP parent node, sister to rel!)

example.name: where they fall
example.text: The increase reflects spending on the S& L rescue as well as payroll and Social Security checks normally issued in October that were issued in September this year because Oct. 1 fell on a Sunday.

example.name: Arg1, 2
example.text: The Fourth of July's falling on a Monday did not seem to dampen our neighbors' enthusiasm for illegal fireworks.

roleset.name: be defeated
roleset.note: FALL-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on fall-v.05. No Vncls. (from fall.02-n)

example.name: pithy
example.text: The pithiest testimony to their domination of the just-concluded tournament came from Giants' manager Roger Craig after his team had fallen in Game Three to a five-home-run barrage that tied a 61-year-old Series record.
example.arg: to a five-home-run barrage that tied a 61-year-old Series record

example.name: Arg1,2
example.text: The Spartans' falling to the army of Xerxes is depicted in the film 300.

example.name: both args-- defeat
example.text: their fall to the Babylonians in 587 BC

example.name: both args-- sort of conversion/defeat
example.text: his fall to the dark side

example.name: just loser
example.text: People in Baghdad celebrate the fall of a leader whose fate is unknown tonight
example.arg: of a leader whose fate is unknown tonight

roleset.name: become
roleset.note: FALL-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on fall-v.07. No Vncls. (from fall.03-n)

example.name: ah, romance!
example.text: When, however, Claudio's sister, Isabella, a novitiate in a convent, goes to Angelo to plead her brother's case, the obdurate ruler immediately falls in love with her and, in a supreme act of hypocrisy, demands that Isabella yield up her virtue to him in exchange for her brother's life.
example.arg: When, however, Claudio's sister, Isabella, a novitiate in a convent, goes to Angelo to plead her brother's case

example.name: Falling Ill
example.text: For [a middle-aged person]-1, * losing one's job is just as traumatic as a car accident, *-1 falling ill, the death of a spouse, or a child running away from home.

example.name: Become a delinquent
example.text: We were worried * that they might fall in with the wrong crowd after they got into junior high.
example.arg: after they got into junior high

example.name: Arg1, 2
example.text: Steve's falling ill coincided with the release party for the third Harry Potter book.

example.name: both args
example.text: their fall into a state of pauperism

example.name: another
example.text: their fall into silence

roleset.name: fall for a trick: be fooled by
roleset.note: FALL-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from fall.10-v)

example.name: both args
example.text: Many people keep falling for this CON - GAME that lower taxes on the rich benefits everyone .
example.arg: for this CON-GAME that lower taxes on the rich benefits everyone

example.name: Both args
example.text: And many will fall for it and vote McCain , because he 's the great war hero and he will protect them .
example.arg: because he's the great war hero and he will protect them

roleset.name: fall back, rely on in emergency

example.text: World Bank president Paul Wolfowitz has fallen back on his last resort.

example.name: Arg0, 1
example.text: Skyler's falling back on her accounting degree was still an option.

example.name: ouch
example.text: John's productivity has fallen off ever since the beatings stopped.

example.name: Arg1
example.text: His scores falling off so quickly surprised fans of the long-time dominant athlete

roleset.name: fall out: no longer be on good terms

example.name: John's fault, usually
example.text: John and Mary fell out over who left their socks in the refrigerator.
example.arg: over who left their socks in the refrigerator

example.name: usually nominal
example.text: John and Mary had a falling out over who left their socks in the refrigerator.
example.arg: over who left their socks in the refrigerator

example.name: Arg1
example.text: Their falling out years ago had lead to a separation between the two branches of the Dupree family.

roleset.name: fall through: not come to pass, not come to pass

example.name: bummer, dude
example.text: The price plummeted after a proposed leveraged buy-out of the airline fell through.
example.arg: a proposed leveraged buy-out of the airline

example.name: Arg1
example.text: Her running plans' falling through angered Wendy's trainer.

roleset.name: fall apart: break, separate into pieces
roleset.note: FALL_APART-V NOTES: Frames updated by Arrick (from fall.09-v)

example.name: crumble
example.text: And if you boil them for longer they do n't come loose and fall apart.
example.arg: if you boil them for longer

example.name: Arg1
example.text: The pastry chefs cried at their prize cake's falling apart; they should never have attempted to move it.

roleset.name: be no longer standing
roleset.note: FALLING_OVER-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from falling.10-n)

example.name: arg ms only within the span
example.text: I've had worse falling over during a game of footy
